title: Body Wash
description: Omoz Naturals body wash is  a soap free, creamy,liquid cleanser, designed for overall body use.
advantages: (-) It give creamy lather, gently cleanses your body.
(-) It remove dirt, oil and other impurities from skin as you shower.
(-) It refreshed your body by give good conditioning effect.
how-to-use: (-) Take required amount of body wash and gently message over wet body, lather and rinse with water.
